definition: next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time
to settle for second best/the next best thing

sentences.english: Second, adults should reappraise their priorities about what is important.
sentences.chinese: 其次，成年人應重新評估什麼事情對他們最重要。

sentences.english: Second, I suggest you to take an additional course in some training center.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我建議你去培訓中心上額外的課程。

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年週期振動爲主，其次是半年週期。

sentences.english: Next, must display sincerely, avoids speaking insincerely.
sentences.chinese: 其次，要表現出真誠，避免言不由衷。

sentences.english: On the other hand the West should not be panicked into unnecessary confrontation.
sentences.chinese: 其次，西方世界不該驚慌於同中國的衝突。

sentences.english: Mark down your top three priorities for the day. Everything else should be secondary.
sentences.chinese: 寫下一天中最需要做的三件事，剩下的事情都在其次。

sentences.english: Second, it helps you avoid the pitfalls of premature optimization in your migration.
sentences.chinese: 其次，它可以幫助您避免遷移過程中的過早優化陷阱。

sentences.english: Second, update the landscape character on Kuling town .
sentences.chinese: 其次，更新牯嶺鎮景觀風貌。

sentences.english: Secondly, it should be polite, helpful.
sentences.chinese: 其次，應該禮貌待人，熱心助人。

sentences.english: Secondly, this paper fully introduces incentive regulation.
sentences.chinese: 其次，本文對激勵性規制作了系統介紹。

sentences.english: Second, it is utilized, at times, as a decoy for incorporating the opposition.
sentences.chinese: 其次，政府有時以補助做爲收編反對勢力的誘餌。

sentences.english: Next,put a cherry in the middle.
sentences.chinese: 其次，在中間放一個櫻桃。

sentences.english: Secondly， I would like to try the local delicacies of Xi’an.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我希望品嚐一下西安的地方美食。

sentences.english: For men, the most-ordered item is burgers, followed by french fries and pizza.
sentences.chinese: 男性點的最多的是漢堡，其次是薯條和比薩餅。

sentences.english: First came the PLA men, then the people's militia.
sentences.chinese: 人民解放軍走在前面，其次是民兵。

sentences.english: Fall is the next-best season, then winter.
sentences.chinese: 其次是秋天最好，然後爲冬季。

definition: of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
